name: gig simulator
description:
Made this for the 'heat death of the universe' bitsy jam. I'd like to do a bit more with it, but I ran out of time. I'll probably update it over the next few days. Learning how to use variables inside bitsy, which was fun! Also enjoyed using the music maker in the new version of bitsy.

sound on, if you want. arrow keys to move around and interact with stuff.
